1:
God, by your power save me from my enemies,\q2 and show people that I have not done anything that is wrong!
\q1
2:
God, listen to my prayer;\q2 listen to what I say to you
\q1
3:
because strangers are trying to attack me;\q2 proud men are wanting to kill me,
\q2 men who have no respect for you.



\q1
4:
But God is the one who helps me;\q2 Yahweh defends me from my enemies.
\q1
5:
He will cause the evil things that they want to do to me to happen to them instead;\q2 because you faithfully do what you have promised to me, destroy them.



\q1
6:
Yahweh, I will gladly give an offering to you because I want to,\q2 and I will thank you, for you are good to me;
\q1
7: you have rescued me from all my troubles,\q2 and I have seen that you have defeated my enemies.
